subject: Re: be careful with water everyone,
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
I'm way ahead of you.  Dave and I have been taking kelp pills for probably about a month now.  We know to avoid the milk and the green leafy vegetables.  This sh**'s everywhere.  People want to make it out like it doesn't exist, cause you can't see it.  But then cancer, too, is invisible and inconspicuous until the later stages.
